<Text: The Gerstein Report
1:
Text: Gerstein Report:  On 17 August 1942, together with Rolf Günther and Wilhelm Pfannenstiel, Gerstein witnessed the gassing of some 3,000 Jews in the extermination camp of Belzec in occupied Poland.
Triplets:<Gerstein

--------------------
Text: Gerstein Report:  The report features his eyewitness testimony.
Triplets:<Gerstein Report

--------------------
Text: Gerstein Report:  It was used as evidence in the Nuremberg Trials.
